downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics GP 10.0 Tools Documentation: Continuum Application Programmer’s Interface (API)
downloadDescription: This documentation describes how to use Continuum API, which is the Component Object Model (COM) API that is available for Microsoft Dynamics GP.
detailsSection:
You can use this page to download the following documentation components:
  • Continuum API Guide (ContinuumAPIGuide.pdf or ContinuumAPIGuide.xps): Explains how to set up Continuum projects and develop integrations, and includes examples and an object library.
  • sanScript Supplement (SanScriptSupplement.pdf or SanScriptSupplement.xps): Includes information about scripting and integrations, and includes reference information about functions, statements, data types, and messages.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the manuals in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the files to your computer.
  3. Repeat these steps on each computer where you want to install the manuals, or save the files to a shared folder where other others can access them.

relatedResourcesSection.title: microsoft Dynamics GP Developer Center on MSDN
